title: Please FIx this Bug!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: So I just got a 5 leaverbuster 20min each. But here is what happened. So i went into queue starting a game waiting 20mins and at random time it resets the timer back to 20min. I had been waiting over 1 hour and 20min just to start a game but I can't go pass my 1st leaverbuster which the time resets at random time Idk why, I didn't click anything. It went from 5min to 20min and to 10min and back to 20min over and over again. I can't start any game at this rate. Please help me. Solution is needed.

replies.body: It sounds like you're losing sync, and our tech team would like to look into this deeper.  Hit us up through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate and find some options for you.
Alright a rioter just send me a email on how to fix it! Thank you guys alot <3
